OrgName: Informed Direct Inc, An Ashfield Company
activities:
Informed Direct Inc obtains personal data from the European Union (EU)/European Economic Area (EEA) and Switzerland in order to operate, maintain and further develop its various healthcare related programs and services including: medical education and communications programs; supporting healthcare professionals in developing data-driven publications; market research/surveys; management, logistics and content development for medical conferences and meetings; external expert identification; pharmaceutical industry competitive intelligence; pharmaceutical marketing consultancy; pharmaceutical pricing, market access and general consultancy; pharmaceutical benchmarking services; promotional communications; medical information services; e-strategy services; web-enabled educational initiatives; mobile applications; studio and visual services; medical PR services. 

Informed Direct Inc may process certain personal information from the EEA and Switzerland from or pertaining to 

1. healthcare professionals and allied health professionals; participants and speakers in conferences operated by Informed Direct Inc; freelance and other service providers; advisors, consultants and other professional experts; prospects; independent contractors; customers/clients, business partners and third party suppliers
- to help customers and business partners complete a transaction or order 
- to deliver products/services 
- to provide customers and business partners with services and information about our services
- to bill and pay for purchased products/services 
- to maintain our accounts and records
- to provide ongoing service and support 
- to contact customers, business partners, and healthcare professionals to complete surveys that are used for marketing and quality assurance purposes or to better understand a therapy, market area or healthcare practices
- to facilitate communication	 
- to select service and personnel 
- to facilitate document submission to congresses or publishers 
- to allow healthcare professionals to register for events and services 
- to work collaboratively with healthcare professionals for performance of, or entering into, a contract/agreement 
- for HCP identification and profiling 
- to book travel, accommodation and event registration 
- to handle emergencies

2. employees and candidates for employment (human resources data) 

- to implement compensation and benefits programs 
- for employee development planning and review 
- for performance appraisals	 
- for training purposes 
- for administration of business travel and expenses 
- for administration of access to Informed Direct Inc facilities and computer networks 
- to maintain internal employee directories 
- to consider candidates for employment opportunities within Informed Direct Inc 
- to aid communication
- to handle emergencies
